Project - Star Society

A Single Item Shop Along With An Affiliate Link Product

View On GitHub

On This Page

    About This Project

    This site sells a single product and has a link to another product on Amazon. Even with just one item, this company can shape their branding better from day one. The second product’s page was modified to hide the price on this site in case of sudden price changes on the Amazon listing. However, it still follows the style of the current site.
